actor.name: Bank teller
actor.description: Bank teller is a bank's employee working at a bank's branch performing operations on behalf of the client present at the desk.

preconditions.item: Client is present at the branch office.

minimal-guarantees.item: Transfer failure and its reason logged in audit log.

success-guarantees.item: Amount and fee debited from the debit account.
Amount credited to the credit account.
Fee credited to proper general ledger account.

condition.when: Debit and credit accounts are the same
condition.step: System displays error message and lets the user identify other accounts.
System logs transaction failure and its reason to audit log.

condition.when: Client walks away at any time

stakeholders-interests.interest: Credit the amount to credit account.
Have all successful transactions posted into transaction log.
Have all failed transactions posted into audit log.

success.step: System retrieves account details by account number.
